description: Defines a Flutter widget 'MiniPlayer' that provides a persistent mini music player UI component, interacting with 'AudioController' for playback controls and navigating to 'PlayerScreen' on tap.

classes.name: MiniPlayer
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a mini music player bar displayed persistently across the app's tabs, showing current song info and playback controls.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the MiniPlayer, displaying song info, and control buttons that interact with the AudioController.
